original_text: The farmer replied, “No, I do not want you to do that. If you pull up the weeds, you may also pull up some of the good wheat plants.
korean_text: 주인이 이르되 가만 두라 가라지를 뽑다가 곡식까지 뽑을까 염려하노라

sentences.original_text: "No, I do not want you to do that
sentences.korean_translation: "아니요, 당신이 그렇게 하는 것을 원하지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: If you pull up the weeds
you may also pull up some of the good wheat plants
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 또한 일부 좋은 밀 식물들도 뽑을 수 있습니다
